title: Chiptune Retro Pack
description: A collection of 18 retro game music tracks in a chiptune style. This package includes 17 original songs plus one variation. These tracks were created with the sounds of early consoles and are perfect for matching with retro pixel artwork.
longDescription:
A collection of 18 retro game music tracks in a chiptune style. This package includes 17 original songs plus one variation. These tracks were created with the sounds of early consoles and are perfect for matching with retro pixel artwork.


Preview


18 cues:

1. 8bit Brawler 0:40

2. 8bit Waltz 0:39

18. The Funky 8bit Blues 2:05
technicalDetails:

  •  Loops
  •  original music only available in this pack
